issue.title: Address apt flakiness with launchpad.net
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2715](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2715). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We've had some failing builds with errors of this variety:

https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/392830710#L689

I'm not sure the nature of the flakiness, but it would be good if we can make more robust

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2715?focusedCommentId=16535076) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
It looks like Antoine already worked on this to make it less flaky https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.travis.yml#L30; I don't think there's much more we can do, e.g. if launchpad.net is truly down

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2715?focusedCommentId=17585902) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
